title: Izzyy Drake & M2thaK on Their Upcoming Fight, Doing Onlyfans, Freshandfit Beef & More
description:
Ahead of their highly anticipated boxing match, MK and Izzy (aka Fake Drake, aka Sexy Drake) sit down for an epic face to face, while Adam is trying to make sense of their overlapping chatter.

---
00:00Intro
3:54 MK says Izzy is a bitch he just wants to fight him for the culture
6:21 Izzy says the Facetime with Drake that leaked was real, Izzy says he has a real relationship with him, Adam and MK are skeptical 
6:50 The Anthony Fantano controversy 
7:57 "I'm the sexy Drake, not the fake Drake"
8:40 Izzy says Baka is the shooter for OVO, Adam corrects him
9:21 Izzy is not on good terms with Drake anymore!!
9:48 Izzy says he has a song coming out with Drake, Adam clearly doesn't believe him, MK says that's why he wants to slap him 
11:01 Izzy flexes about Facetiming with Drake, MK clowns him some more
11:56 MK says Izzy been training with 4 Locos
15:31 Izzy + Izzy says he created the "Clone formula"
17:32 SODMG Saga + How he built his relationship with Soulja Boy
22:11 "I'm gonna fart in your face after I knock you out" - MK
22:16 "You smell like coochie and garbage truck juice" - MK
22:22 MK says Izzy will NEVER knock him out 
24:13 MK breaks down how he's gonna ridicule Izzy and how the business will be handled
26:03 Preme told Izzy that Drake doesn't fck with him, to stop calling that he doesn't wanna engage with Izzy 
27:11 Adam asks to see the DMs, Izzy says it's on his manager's phone...
28:00 Izzy made OF content with Stephanie
28:28 Stephanie walks in 
30:07 Stephanie and Izzy are dating and filming for OF 
35:22 Adam questions their relationship 
36:04 Is she staying with him if Izzy gets knocked out on Oct 15th?
36:30 Stephanie explains who she thinks gonna win 
36:45 Stephanie says that MK is gonna knock Izzy out!!!
38:50 MK tells Izzy to STFU and insult him in Arabic
43:31 MK keeps saying Izzy has a coochie
43:54 MK explains what happened on Fresh & Fit + Says he has a team of hackers that's gonna end you + How he finesses some folks and delete their pages so they come back to him and pay to get it back
47:25 Izzy and Stephanie say they know ppl who can delete people pages + Breaks down why she does it 
50:33 Stephanie tryna set up a date with Adam and Lena while Izzy will be boxing

---
